datalocks.client_D_ID: D_ID in (select D_ID from jsharmony.D where C_ID=@datalock_c_id or D_SCOPE='S')
datalocks.client_D_SCOPE_ID: (((D_SCOPE = 'S' or D_SCOPE = 'C') and D_SCOPE_ID=@datalock_c_id) or (D_SCOPE='E' and D_SCOPE_ID in (select E_ID from E where E.C_ID=@datalock_c_id)))
datalocks.client_N_ID: N_ID in (select N_ID from jsharmony.N where C_ID=@datalock_c_id)
datalocks.client_N_SCOPE_ID: ((N_SCOPE = 'C' and N_SCOPE_ID=@datalock_c_id) or (N_SCOPE='E' and N_SCOPE_ID in (select E_ID from E where E.C_ID=@datalock_c_id)))
datalocks.client_PE_ID: PE_ID in (select PE_ID from jsharmony.CPE where C_ID=@datalock_c_id)
datalocks.client_CPER_ID: CPER_ID in (select CPER_ID from jsharmony.CPER inner join jsharmony.CPE on CPE.PE_ID=CPER.PE_ID where CPE.C_ID=@datalock_c_id)
